event.name: AA_BOSS_REBEL_CRUISER_DESTROYED
event.text: The gargantuan orange vessel bursts into flames for a brief moment as its fuel tanks explode, before it is promptly extinguished by the vacuum of space. Its wreckage begins to succumb to the gravitational pull of the nearby planet, the debris setting alight again as it breaks up in the atmosphere. You've won.

event.name: AA_BOSS_REBEL_CRUISER_DEADCREW
event.text: With nobody left alive on board to stop you or to pilot the ship, it grows inactive and unable to fight back. A prompt shuttle docking allows you unrestricted access to the ship's interior, which you are happy to strip of anything valuable before turning the empty cruiser over to the dry dock. You've won.
